Sarge turns to Grounded. Perplex runs to Trinity and starts trying to break=
 the net. He pulls out a knife and starts cutting the ropes. Zeni backs awa=
y more and more. Sarge looks angry, but then smiles.

Sarge: How do you do,=
 civilian. I'm here to help you, I'm the Sarge. That's how you'll know me, =
I'm here to stop Deemos.

Perplex: Does that involved netting Trinity?

Sar=
ge: That? Oh, that was me and my temper. But I'm smart even when blowing my=
 top off. Note that I only used a net.

Perplex was confused by this guy. H=
e comes along and...Actually, Perplex doesn't know what he's doing at all!
=

Sarge: Hey, what's that kid so far away for?

Sarge pointed at Zeni.

Perp=
lex: He's afraid of my weapons.

Sarge: Well bring him back here, I'm going=
 to turn him into a soldier.

Perplex: What?

Sarge: Hahaha, yeah, Deemos w=
on't be killing any more innocents...
